</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 36 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The version of the alicorn lance which does evil damage may not be purchased or crafted in Pathfinder Society play._

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Lance](/Weapons.aspx?ID=28)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This white _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [lance](/Weapons.aspx?ID=28)_ is made from the horn of a [unicorn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=397), willingly granted at the end of its lifetime. In addition to its normal damage, it deals 1 good damage on successful attacks. You can make the lance glow like a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) or suppress its light by using an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

<document level="2" id="action-1576" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include a horn willingly gifted by a unicorn. In rare instances, an _alicorn lance_ can be made with a forcibly taken horn. However this heinous act pollutes the horn's magic, causing it to glow with a sickly red light, deal evil damage instead of good damage, and make the unicorn spirit evoked in the charge to whinny visibly in pain.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
